description:
http://anidb.net/ch5913 [Tokiha Mai] and her sickly younger brother, http://anidb.net/ch5933 [Takumi], have received a scholarship to attend the prestigious Fuuka Academy. On the way there, the ferry they are travelling on becomes the site of a destructive battle between two girls wielding apparently supernatural powers. This is only the beginning of their troubles, as Mai learns that she herself possesses these powers — the powers of a HiME.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
For brother and sister Mai and Takumi Tokiha, a trip to their new school turns bizarre when a girl with a large sword turns up in the water. And when the ship is suddenly attacked, Mai finds herself with unbelievable powers!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est un grand bouleversement dans la vie d’une jeune fille !
เหตุการณ์สำคัญของสาวน้อย

REGULAR.description:
After an awkward first morning at school, Mai tries to adjust to life at Fuka Academy! Right when she thinks she’s settled, the attacker from the previous night appears on campus. But things get worse when a strange creature attacks Takumi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความลับหลังเลิกเรียน

REGULAR.description:
With a new power and a new destiny, Mai must accept the abilities and burden that come with being a HiME. But the future that awaits her is a dangerous one. A meeting with the headmistress leads to much-needed answers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoo no Mai / Hoshi no Chikai
การร่ายรำแห่งเปลวเพลิง / คำอธิษฐานต่อดวงดาว

REGULAR.description:
Something is up around campus—girls’ underwear has gone missing! Orphans are causing trouble around campus and only the HiME can stop them. But can Mai and Natsuki work together?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ส-า-ย-ล-ม เล่นตลก

REGULAR.description:
An Orphan is attacking buses around the city, but Mai can’t focus on the enemy when she has to worry about Takumi’s health. But will Yuichi be the shoulder she can cry on when it becomes too much?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ฝนกับน้ำตา

REGULAR.description:
When Yuichi asks Mai and Takumi to help out with a wedding at Shiho’s family shrine, things take a turn for the awkward. Shiho asks Mai not to steal Yuichi from her, and on top of that, Midori Sugiura reveals something unbelievable!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: สาววัย 17 ผู้ลุกโชน

REGULAR.description:
Mikoto follows a classmate to discover she’s hiding a dangerous secret. But when she gets caught up in the trouble, what will it mean for Mai and the other HiME?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เหล่าลูกแมวหลงทาง

REGULAR.description:
A day at the school festival turns dark when Orphans begin to attack. Powers are revealed, lives are claimed—what is in store for the girls burdened with the powers of the HiME?
Source: crunchyroll

It’s summertime which means it’s time to hit the beach! But there’s more going on when Mai discovers Natsuki lurking around in the middle of the night. What are her true motives?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mer, les jeunes filles et le secret de Natsuki
The Sea, the Maidens, and Natsuki`s Secret
Umi to Otome to Natsuki no Himitsu
ทะเล กับหญิงสาว และความลับของนัตสึกิ
海とオトメとなつきのヒミツ♪

REGULAR.description:
To make up their not-so-great grades in home economics, the girls and their classmates participate in a cake-baking contest. In this contest hosted by Midori, things are sure to heat up. But trouble doesn’t take a break—even for cake!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: สงครามเค้ก!!!

REGULAR.description:
Something is happening to girls around campus, and people are blaming…a vampire?! But this attacker is after specific girls—the HiME!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La ronde des ténèbres et de la lumière
บทเพลงบรรเลงซ้ำของแสงสว่างกับความมืด

REGULAR.description:
Plots uncovered, questions asked—Natsuki finds the group behind the vampires only to get herself kidnapped. With a little unexpected help, can Mai make it in time to save her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: รอยยิ้มของนางฟ้า

REGULAR.description:
Love is in the air in preparation for the Tamayura Festival! But do the HiME have time to find love and figure out what Alyssa and Miyu are planning to do next? Mai finds herself with mixed feelings about her priorities and where her heart lies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ค่ำคืนแห่งทามายูระ

REGULAR.description:
While everyone tries to wrap their heads around the explosion last night, armed tanks suddenly appear on campus! Alyssa and Miyu do whatever it takes to seek out the HiME on campus—will the girls escape, or do they make their final stand?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เป้าหมายคือโรงเรียน

REGULAR.description:
The HiME come together to take back Fuka Academy. With little time before the next attack, they must act quickly to save their classmates and stop Alyssa’s plans. But the cost of survival, what it will take to save them all—who will make the sacrifice?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A High School Girl Soars to the Heavens
Une lycéenne à travers la galaxie
นักเรียนหญิงม.ปลาย ทะยานสู่อวกาศ
天翔ける ﾐ☆ 女子高生

REGULAR.description:
With Mai’s return, normalcy has settled in. Midori gathers the girls and urges them to join forces. But after a night of karaoke and fun, they learn what new battle awaits them, and the HiME festival begins!
Source: crunchyroll

Finally, the truth about HiME and their purpose has been laid out. But to save the world, the girls must fight one another to take away each other’s precious one. What choices will they make, and who will win this battle royal?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ปากที่หลอกลวง

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious figure attacks Mai but disappears before they can find out who it is. Natsuki shares her past, and one of the girls attacks another! Will they follow the destiny Nagi spoke of, or can they make their own path?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: จุดเริ่มต้น

REGULAR.description:
Between the impending festival and caring for Takumi, Mai is reaching her breaking point. Tension rises for the HiME as the pressure of whether to fight or not begins to grow. Mai lashes out at Mikoto—what will become of them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: จิตใจที่คดเคี้ยว

REGULAR.description:
Nao attacks Takumi in an act of revenge. As Mai and the others hurry to protect him, the mysterious girl in white appears once more. A sword is drawn, a Child is slain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dance of Flames / Tears of Destiny
Honoo no Mai / Namida no Unmei
La danse des flammes / Un destin fait de larmes
การร่ายรำแห่งเปลวเพลิง / ชะตากรรมแห่งหยาดน้ำตา

REGULAR.description:
Reito takes in a broken Mai while Natsuki learns a harsh truth about her mother. A new HiME is revealed, and more truths come to light. In this unavoidable fight, who can be trusted?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เจ้าชายแห่งความมืดตื่นขึ้นแล้ว
黒き君, 目覚めるとき

REGULAR.description:
The school is falling apart, both students and teachers leaving. Midori shares the secret to saving the remaining HiME, but the only option is to continue fighting. Mai makes a decision—but what are her motives?
Source: crunchyroll

Midori makes the decision to awaken Miyu but is met with resistance from Mikoto. The fight between HiME continues, and more precious ones are lost. The final battle approaches.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความรักและมิตรภาพ ที่สูญสิ้น

REGULAR.description:
The choices we make can determine our fate. There is no way to go back. Anything that seems like another chance could turn out to be a mere illusion. What is it that Mai really wants—is the answer out there?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความรักคือการต่อสู้

REGULAR.description:
Mai and Natsuki prepare to end this fight once and for all and go their separate ways. Miyu faces off with Mikoto, and Mai finds herself at the door of the Obsidian Prince.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ก้าวสู่ชะตากรรม

REGULAR.description:
Can destiny be changed?  Can sacrifices be undone? Mai fights the final battle against Mikoto and Reito. With so much lost, is the world still worth saving?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 舞衣とはじめてのブラ
Introduction to the Private Fuuka Academy
詩帆のお兄ちゃんとドキドキ
Haruka no Seito Kaichou Rikkouho Enzetsu
遥の生徒会長立候補演説
Youko and Midori`s "Our Days of Youth"
Youko to Midori no "Warera ga Seishun no Hibi"
陽子と碧の『われらが青春の日々』
Tate Yuuichi no "Ki ni Naru Aitsu"
楯祐一の『気になるアイツ』
碧の『運命なんかぶっとばせ!』
Kazahana Yashiki Gensou: Mashiro to Fumi
風花邸幻想 ~真白と二三~
To My Older Sister, From Tokiha Takumi
お姉ちゃんへ 鴇羽巧海より
なつき, 静留を語る
Kuro no Mai / Saigo no Bansan
The Black Dance / The Last Supper
黒の舞 / 最後の晩餐
Mai Hime vs. Mai Otome - "Moe"? The Greatest Battle!
舞-HiME 対 舞-乙HiME 萌え? 史上最大の決戦!!

3797.name: trapped in the body of a child

4073.name: unusual weapons -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED

4612.name: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

6066.name: improvised weapons -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED

titles.title: ไม-HiME ศึกศาสตราเจ้าหญิงแห่งดวงดาว
ศึกศาตราเจ้าหญิงแห่งดวงดาว
